entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 8.
